thread.title: BRIEF-Corbus Pharmaceuticals Reports 2017 Financial Results And Provides Clinical Update

title: BRIEF-Corbus Pharmaceuticals Reports 2017 Financial Results And Provides Clinical Update
text: March 12, 2018 / 11:15 AM / Updated 9 minutes ago BRIEF-Corbus Pharmaceuticals Reports 2017 Financial Results And Provides Clinical Update Reuters Staff March 12 (Reuters) - Corbus Pharmaceuticals Holdings Inc : * CORBUS PHARMACEUTICALS REPORTS 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS AND PROVIDES CLINICAL UPDATE * CORBUS PHARMACEUTICALS HOLDINGS INC - CASH AND CASH EQUIVALENTS BALANCE AT DECEMBER 31, 2017 WAS APPROXIMATELY $62.5 MILLION * CORBUS PHARMACEUTICALS - EXPECTS CURRENT CASH ON HAND, EXPECTED MILESTONE PAYMENTS TO FUND OPERATIONS THROUGH Q4 OF 2019 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
